column4: Allow the user to specify and control the project closing process through user defined tables and security roles.
Supports multiple closing of projects at the user's options.
Provide an automated procedure to purge and archive data for closed projects.
Identify inactive projects for possible close.
Close project at user specified date.
Close and capitalize or expense each project as completed and make required entries to the asset or expense accounts and  work-in-progress accounts.
Allow a user with appropriate security to re-open a closed project.
